trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKZC013_04222_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Scouts must excel in keeping themselves hidden, but when even their own comrades cannot locate them, there is surely trouble afoot.
TEXT_AKTKZC013_04222_TODO_00<tab>Search for the wounded contingent scout.
TEXT_AKTKZC013_04222_TODO_01<tab>Speak with the wounded contingent scout.
TEXT_AKTKZC013_04222_TODO_02<tab>Aid the injured civilian.
TEXT_AKTKZC013_04222_TODO_03<tab>Report to Talon.
TEXT_AKTKZC013_04222_TALON_000_000<tab>Please, a moment of your time!
TEXT_AKTKZC013_04222_TALON_000_001<tab>A friend who was sent out on reconnaissance has been gone far too long, and she's not responding to her linkpearl.
TEXT_AKTKZC013_04222_TALON_000_002<tab>Will you help me look for her?
TEXT_AKTKZC013_04222_TALON_000_003<tab>I knew you would! Let's split up─I'll search around the camp, while you head for the lake.
TEXT_AKTKZC013_04222_TALON_000_004<tab>If this doesn't work, we'll have to cast the net a bit wider.
TEXT_AKTKZC013_04222_WOUNDEDSOLDIER04222_000_010<tab>Thank goodness you're here. Never mind me, this man is in desperate need of aid!
TEXT_AKTKZC013_04222_WOUNDEDCITIZEN04222_100_020<tab>Ugh!

TEXT_AKTKZC013_04222_WOUNDEDCITIZEN04222_000_020<tab>I thought he could use my help, so I called out to him, but he soon bolted in fear. That's when one of these fiends appeared out of nowhere and pounced on him.
TEXT_AKTKZC013_04222_WOUNDEDSOLDIER04222_000_021<tab>Although I rushed to fend it off, it had already signaled to its pack mates. Then, just as they had me on the back foot, you arrived.

TEXT_AKTKZC013_04222_WOUNDEDSOLDIER04222_000_022<tab>I would've called for assistance if my hands weren't already full. But thanks to your timely intervention, I can finally send for troops to take this poor fellow to safety.

TEXT_AKTKZC013_04222_WOUNDEDSOLDIER04222_000_023<tab>I'll move him to a more secure location until our comrades get here. While you and I are both perfectly capable of conveying the situation via linkpearl, perhaps it would set their minds at ease if you could also speak to them in person?
TEXT_AKTKZC013_04222_WOUNDEDSOLDIER04222_000_024<tab>Once he's caught his breath, I'll get him out of the open. I'm sure there's a good hiding place nearby.
TEXT_AKTKZC013_04222_WOUNDEDCITIZEN04222_000_025<tab>Ugh!
TEXT_AKTKZC013_04222_TALON_000_030<tab>Gods be good! I'll dispatch troops at once!
TEXT_AKTKZC013_04222_TALON_000_031<tab>We're lucky you got there when you did, though I wonder what drew that civilian to such a dangerous place to begin with. Perhaps he was in search of supplies?

TEXT_AKTKZC013_04222_TALON_000_032<tab>I doubt he'd find much food in that particular area, so it must've been fuel he was after. If I were him, I'd try that enormous extraction facility on the lake, but it sounds like he was hoping to get ceruleum from the water itself.

TEXT_AKTKZC013_04222_TALON_000_033<tab>Seems like a tricky task at the best of times, although I expect the folks around those parts have their methods. If so, they could probably stay holed up for months on end, providing there's enough food to go around.
TEXT_AKTKZC013_04222_TALON_000_034<tab>Well, the main thing is that he and my friend are no longer in any danger. I see now you're every bit the hero people say you are, not that I ever doubted it!
